page.title: 15ABBEY SCHOOL,SHERBORNE
page.content: Abbey school was first opened in 1856 with Mr Thomas Spence as the Head Master. The present headmaster is Mr D.L.Downton. Studies within this education establishment include the normal range of accademic subjects_ Maths,English,Geography and History_ together with rounders, mini rugby and Music. The ages in the school range from 5 to 11. The staff consists of 9 teachers two of whom are male. In the last year a computer has been instal _led as well as an electric organ and keyboard. Since the school was built a swimming pool has been added as well as changing rooms, a library and solar heating panels. Each lesson is between 45 mins to an hour. Lunch break is from 12.30 to 1.30. Parents help raise money for the school. Abbey School is one of 2 primary schools in the area.
